name: ITC Infotech
tag_list: cpg, travel, crm, plm, bfsi, lifesciences, it-services, it-consulting, it-solutions
description: IT Services, IT Consulting, IT Solutions
overview:
ITC Infotech, a global IT services company, is a fully-owned subsidiary of ITC Limited, the US$ 7 billion diversified conglomerate. ITC Limited is rated among the ‘World’s Most Reputable Companies’ by Forbes magazine and among ‘India’s Most Valuable Companies’ by Business Today.

ITC Infotech has established a service delivery footprint spanning across 5 continents and 140 countries across North America, Europe and Asia Pacific, in addition to its operations in India, namely in Bangalore, Kolkata, Pune and Thiruvananthapuram.

ITC Infotech offers Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) software solutions,OptSustain(Sustainability management and reporting tool),software testing services, engineering services and solutions, Product Lifecycle Management (PLM) solutions, offshore software development centers, IT infrastructure outsourcing, CRM system implementation, risk management solutions, retail technology services, logistics supply chain management, Supply Chain Management (SCM) solutions, application development services, Data Warehousing and Business Intelligence (DWBI).

ITC Infotech provides end to end solutions for the following verticals Banking, Financial Services & Insurance (BFSI), Consumer Packaged Goods (CPG), Life Sciences, Hospitality, Manufacturing, Media & Entertainment, Retail, Travel, Transportation & Logistics.
